attributes.action: Do NOT send British troops to Ukraine
attributes.additional_details:
We, the people do not believe this is the right approach to resolve the war.
Our Armed Forces should not be sent to become what could be a part of a European Army.
attributes.background:
The Prime Minister has indicated he would be willing to send British troops to the Ukraine as part of a peace keeping force.
Our country currently has no military presence in Ukraine.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Don't send troops to Ukraine to support peacekeeping
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/705814
